ComicInfo.Title: Ash Vs. Dracula Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary:
Now, Ash and a mysterous figure are getting their car repaired and talking about getting out of New York, fast.
One Week Ago, Dracula is raising a monster army. It includes a pack of werewolves, several mummies, three vampire women and Frankenstein's monster. With the Necronomicon he releases a plague of bats and darkness on to New York City just as Ash and Sugarbaby arrive.
Sugarbaby is still trying to convince Ash that New York is being over run by vampires and it up to them to stop them. Just as Ash and Sugarbaby sit down for dinner at a fast food place Dr.Hieronymus Von Heinrich introduces himself and explains that Sugarbaby is right and he needs the choosen one to help him stop Dracula.
Just then the window to the resturant is smashed in by five vampires looking for Ash.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev55 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-30 18:43:42. [Issue ID 111541]
